definition: the Mid-autumn festival, the traditional moon-viewing festival on the 15th of the 8th lunar month
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
autumn/fall/harvest time
surname Qiu
old variant of 秋[qiu1]

sentences.english: The annual traditional festival Mid-Autumn Festival, countless lovers and eventually became dependents places.
sentences.chinese: 每年的中秋传统佳节，无数的有情人终成眷宿。

sentences.english: Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival, but I get up late as usual.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中秋节，但我还是一如往常的晚起。

sentences.english: We're gonna get together go to the wonderful light show on the mid-autumn day.
sentences.chinese: 在中秋那天夜晚，我们将一起去看灯会。

sentences.english: A full moon hung in the sky on Mid-autumn Day.
sentences.chinese: 中秋那天，一轮圆月挂在天空。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Day is on the August 15th of the lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: “中秋节”是在农历八月十五这一天。

sentences.english: Would you and Lily like to come over to my home for Mid-Autumn Festival?
sentences.chinese: 你和莉莉希望过来到我家过中秋节吗？

sentences.english: And Yuantong Express raised price again during mid Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 今年中秋节前，圆通速运也再次调价。

sentences.english: Later, aristocrats and literary figures helped expand the ceremony to common people.
sentences.chinese: 后来，贵族和文人学士把中秋祭月的传统推广到民间。

sentences.english: The day after tomorrow, we will be celebrating the traditional Chinese holiday, the Mid-Autumn Festival.
sentences.chinese: 再过两天，就是一年一度的中国传统佳节中秋节。

sentences.english: Fortunately, the Mid-Autumn Festival is no class, so the sleep time.
sentences.chinese: 幸好中秋节不用上课，于是有了补眠的时候。

sentences.english: And the moon is what this celebration is all about.
sentences.chinese: 而月亮正是中秋节庆祝的主题。

sentences.english: Including moon cakes Guang-moon cakes have become the leading annual output value exceeding 100 million yuan.
sentences.chinese: 其中中秋月饼更成为广式月饼的龙头，年产值超亿元。

sentences.english: Mid- Autumn Festival and Spring Festival are special festivals in China.
sentences.chinese: 中秋节和春节是中国特别的节日。

sentences.english: The Mid-Autumn Festival celebrations date back to more than 2,000 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 庆祝中秋节可以向前追溯到2000多年前。

sentences.english: Second, the Mid-Autumn festival is coming, especially in the market shortage of maotai liquor.
sentences.chinese: 其次，中秋即将来临，茅台酒在市场上尤为紧缺。
